settings.label: Use multiple currencies
settings.info: This will show a dropdown of currencies so customers can see prices based on thier location

settings.label: Currency Codes
settings.info: Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code e.g. NZD USD CAD. [A complete list of currency codes can be found here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php).
